entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:11 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 08:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023
Temperature: -36.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -45

Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:10 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:10 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023
